mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOTE ( VOTE_NO, VOTE_TITLE, VOTE_START, VOTE_END, VOTE_CREATE, VOTE_TYPE, STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_VONO.NEXTVAL, #{voteTitle}, #{voteStart}, #{voteEnd}, SYSDATE, #{voteType}, 'W' )
mapper.update: UPDATE VOTE SET STATUS = CASE WHEN VOTE_START <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND VOTE_END >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN 'Y' WHEN VOTE_END < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN 'N' ELSE 'W' END WHERE STATUS != 'X'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VOTE WHERE STATUS != 'X'
SELECT VOTE_NO, VOTE_TITLE, VOTE_START, VOTE_END, VOTE_CREATE, VOTE_TYPE, STATUS FROM VOTE WHERE STATUS != 'X' ORDER BY VOTE_NO DESC

select.if: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VOTE WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VOTE WHERE STATUS = 'W'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VOTE WHERE STATUS = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VOTE WHERE STATUS != 'X'

choose.when: SELECT VOTE_NO, VOTE_TITLE, VOTE_START, VOTE_END, VOTE_CREATE, VOTE_TYPE, STATUS FROM VOTE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY VOTE_NO DESC
SELECT VOTE_NO, VOTE_TITLE, VOTE_START, VOTE_END, VOTE_CREATE, VOTE_TYPE, STATUS FROM VOTE WHERE STATUS = 'W' ORDER BY VOTE_NO DESC
SELECT VOTE_NO, VOTE_TITLE, VOTE_START, VOTE_END, VOTE_CREATE, VOTE_TYPE, STATUS FROM VOTE WHERE STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY VOTE_NO DESC

SELECT VOTE_NO, VOTE_TITLE, VOTE_START, VOTE_END, VOTE_CREATE, VOTE_TYPE, STATUS FROM VOTE WHERE STATUS != 'X'
ORDER BY VOTE_NO DESC

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VOTE WHERE VOTE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
SELECT VOTE_NO, VOTE_TITLE, VOTE_START, VOTE_END, VOTE_CREATE, VOTE_TYPE, STATUS FROM VOTE WHERE VOTE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND STATUS != 'X'
SELECT VOTE_NO, VOTE_TITLE, VOTE_START, VOTE_END, VOTE_CREATE, VOTE_TYPE, STATUS FROM VOTE WHERE VOTE_NO = #{voteNo}
SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_NAME, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, ITEM_COUNT, VOTE_NO FROM VOTE_ITEM WHERE VOTE_NO = #{voteNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOTE_MEMBER ( USER_NO, VOTE_NO, ITEM_NO ) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{voteNo}, #{itemNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE VOTE_ITEM SET ITEM_COUNT = ITEM_COUNT + 1 WHERE ITEM_NO = #{itemNo}
mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_NO FROM VOTE_MEMBER WHERE VOTE_NO = #{voteNo} AND USER_NO = #{userNo}

update.foreach: UPDATE VOTE_ITEM SET ITEM_COUNT = ITEM_COUNT - 1 WHERE ITEM_NO = #{item.itemNo}

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM VOTE_MEMBER WHERE VOTE_NO = #{voteNo} AND USER_NO = #{userNo}
